attributes.action: To add Friday as a part of the weekend for all people.Having 3 days off.
attributes.additional_details: Since Saturday is the Sabbath for the Jews and Sunday for the Christians.Having Friday as a Weekend benefits all people and also bussinesses!
attributes.background: The Weekends we have cater for the Jews(Saturday)and Christians(Sunday).Islam is an Abrahamic Faith and should be recognised as such, to have Friday added to the weekend for all people.This would also cater for all families and time they can spend with their Children.
